title: Copy Of My Case File With All Supporting Documents

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Copy Of My Case File With All Supporting Documents
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello - I am requesting a copy of my case file which was submitted via IC3 more than ten years ago. I am 68 years old and I am unemployed an in a dire economic situation. I lost $80,000.00 via a cyber crime given my vulnerabilities. I immediately reported this scam to the FBI via their IC3 website. I never had the courtesy of a single response from the FBI since I filed that case of online theft. Not a single response. It's fairly obvious to me that absolutely nothing was investigated. I now suffer from memory loss and cardio vascular disease. I have identified a private company which is willing to investigate this scam on my behalf. I am not optimistic that I will recover any funds given the elapsed timeframe. However, I need to try. I really thought the FBI will act given the amount of money I lost.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Earl James Gobin
